component.name: LinuxHWMonitor
component.summary: Hardware monitor and S.M.A.R.T. disk health checker for Linux

description.p: LinuxHWMonitor is a native Linux hardware monitoring application inspired by CrystalDiskInfo and HWiNFO64. It provides detailed S.M.A.R.T. disk health information and comprehensive hardware detection for CPU, GPU, motherboard and RAM.

ul.li: S.M.A.R.T. health status and full attribute table for SATA and NVMe drives
Disk temperature, power-on hours, power cycles, and total host writes
CPU detection: model, cores, threads, cache hierarchy, microcode, instruction sets
GPU detection: name, driver, VRAM, OpenGL and Vulkan versions (NVIDIA/AMD/Intel)
Motherboard: manufacturer, model, chipset, BIOS type (UEFI/Legacy), PCIe slots, SATA ports
RAM: per-module details including speed, manufacturer, part number, channel mode
Clean dark-themed interface similar to CrystalDiskInfo

description.p: Initial release with S.M.A.R.T. disk monitoring and full hardware detection.
